ctbanle.defaultvalues: ,,,,,=select ten_ts from MCC where so_the_ts=@[so_the_ts_xuat],,,,,,=select ton_tt from tontucthoi where ma_vt='[ma_vt]' and ma_kho ='[ma_kho]' and ma_tt1 ='[ma_tt1]' and ma_tt2 ='[ma_tt2]' and ma_tt3 ='[ma_tt3]' and ma_tt4 ='[ma_tt4]' and ma_tt5 ='[ma_tt5]'![so_the_ts_xuat],,=exec get_giaban_buon @[ma_vt]%p @[ma_dvt]%p @M[ma_kh]%p@M[ty_gia]%p@[ma_tt1]%p@[ma_tt2]%p@[ma_tt3]%p@[ma_tt4]%p@[ma_tt5],=[gia_ban_nt]*M[ty_gia] ![ma_tt1]![ma_tt2]![ma_tt3]![ma_tt4]![ma_tt5]![ma_vt]![ma_dvt] ![so_the_ts_xuat],=[gia_ban_nt]*[sl_xuat] ![ma_tt1]![ma_tt2]![ma_tt3]![ma_tt4]![ma_tt5]![ma_vt]![ma_dvt] !M[]![so_the_ts_xuat],=[tien_nt]*M[ty_gia] ![ma_tt1]![ma_tt2]![ma_tt3]![ma_tt4]![ma_tt5]![gia_ban_nt]![sl_xuat]![ma_vt]![ma_dvt]![so_the_ts_xuat],=select tk_tien from ddv where ma_dvcs = @M[ma_dvcs]![so_the_ts_xuat],=exec get_tyleCKban_buon @[ma_vt]%p@[ma_dvt]%p@M[ma_kh]%p@[ma_kho]%p@[sl_xuat]![so_the_ts_xuat],=exec get_tienCKban_buon @[ma_vt]%p@[ma_dvt]%p@M[ma_kh]%p@[ma_kho]%p@[sl_xuat]%p@[tien_nt]%p@M[ty_gia]%p@[ty_le_ck] ![ma_tt1]![ma_tt2]![ma_tt3]![ma_tt4]![ma_tt5]![gia_ban_nt]![sl_xuat]![ma_vt]![ma_dvt] !M[]![so_the_ts_xuat],=[tien_ck_nt]*M[ty_gia] ![ma_tt1]![ma_tt2]![ma_tt3]![ma_tt4]![ma_tt5]![gia_ban_nt]![sl_xuat]![ma_vt]![ma_dvt]![tien_nt]![ty_le_ck]![so_the_ts_xuat],,,,,,,,,,
